title: Copyright on Blockchain
introduction: Blockchain technology and digital copyright protection can perfectly combined to solve the current situation of rampant piracy. The copyright can be confirmed in time and the copyright transaction process not only protect the value of the works, the interests of the creator but also make the  copyright to realize it’s value through the development, promotion,derivation and applying process conducted by professional institutions.

This application mainly contains three functions, copyright storage, copyright authorization and purchase rights. After users add copyright authentication function, they can conduct the  authorization process under the module of “owned copyright”, which will be displayed in the Copyright Mall, and other users can purchase rights in the Copyright Mall.
name: Name

Query.title: Copyright Details
Query.notallow: Authors are temporarily not allowed to purchase the authorization

Auth.title: My Authorization
Auth.mine: You are the author of the work

Shop.title: Shop
Shop.notice: After the authorization, your copyright will be on sale in the copyright market

Notice.unknow: Failure to register copyright, Input parameters may have errors
Notice.neterror: Failure to register copyright, It may be due to the network or other reasons
